summary: The diff shows modifications to PrizesDisplay.tsx that successfully implement both requirements. The component now displays prizes in a flat grid layout without category grouping headers, and there is no 'more prizes to be announced' section visible in the truncated code. The implementation maintains prize amounts and visual consistency.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a prominent 'Medals for All Participants' banner section with animations and special styling
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states constraints to preserve existing prize amounts and not modify the prize structure. The requirements focus only on removing category grouping and the 'more prizes' section. A new medals banner was not requested and appears to be an unsolicited addition that changes the prize display structure.
